about_the_game:
Use Davy’s grappling hook and Olympian core muscles to swing and leap to new heights that will test your perception, endurance, and finesse. Push your limits and in due time you’ll be amazed by what you and Davy can accomplish!

Davy Hooker is a tough yet rewarding single-player platformer. In between death-defying jumps are many puzzling puzzles to puzzle through and test your mind as much as your fingers. Explore and surpass 14 unique levels and try to find all the additional secret and bonus levels.

Take on a serious challenge.

This game will test you. Take your time and explore different movements. You may be surprised how nimble Davy can be with practice. We recommend challenging your friends so you can watch them hilariously fall and enjoy the struggle together.

Tailor your experience with a unique difficulty system.

Play with checkpoints to preserve your casual sanity or bear the full weight of every fall and misstep and achieve the ultimate bragging rights! There’s always practice mode to take your time to master the toughest challenges Davy’s world has to offer. On any difficulty you’ll find that levels offer dynamic paths to success. Choose between reliable routes or take high-flying shortcuts… and don’t look down.

Explore a strange and beautiful world.

And check behind every pixel… You’ll find this world is more than it may seem.

Davy Hooker features a groovy original soundtrack which blends retro and modern electronic sounds to complement the game’s artfully crafted world of pixels and magic.

name: Davy Hooker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6300U or greater
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 100 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Can you get Davy to the top? Swing your way through a surreal world in this hand-crafted challenge platformer. Grapple with unique challenges, explore hidden paths, and try not to fall!
